translations.translation: We would have seized him by force,
We would have seized him by his right hand,
We would surely have seized him by the right hand,
We would have caught hold of him by his right hand
We would have definitely taken revenge from him.
We surely would have seized him by his right hand,
We would certainly have seized him by the right hand,
We would have seized him by the right hand,
We assuredly had taken him by the right hand
We would indeed have seized him by his right hand
We surely had lain hold of him by the right hand.
We would have surely seized him by the right hand
We should certainly seize him by his right hand,
We surely should have seized him by his right hand (or with power and might),
We would have seized him by the right hand
We would have seized him by the right arm.
We would have seized him by the right hand;
[69:45] We would have assuredly seized him, We would have exacted vengeance [against him], as punishment, by the Right Hand, by [Our] strength and power;
(We assuredly had taken him) We assuredly had taken revenge against him (by the right hand) by means of truth and proofs; it is also said this means: We assuredly had vehemently taken him.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { لأَخَذْنَا مِنْهُ بِٱلْيَمِينِ } معناه بالقُوةِ والقُدرةِ

translations.translation: And His saying, "We will take from him with the right [hand]," means with power and ability.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ لأَخَذْنَا } ألبتة وانتقمنا { مِنْهُ بِٱلْيَمِينِ } [الحاقة: 45] أي: بالقدرة الكاملة
 كما ننتقم من سائر العصاة والمفترين

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ لأخذنا منه باليمين } أي: لقتلناه صبراً
 كما تفعل الملوك بمَن يَكذب عليهم
 مُعاجلةً بالسخط والانتقام
 فصوّر قتل الصبر بصورته ليكون أهْول
 وهو أن يأخذ بيده
 وتضرب رقبته
 وخصَّ اليمين لأنَّ القتَّال إذا أراد أن يوقع الضرب في قفاه أخذ بيساره
 وإذا أراد أن يوقعه في جيده
 وهو أن يكفحه بالسيف ـ وهو أشد على المصبور لنظره إلى السيف ـ أخذه بيمينه
 ومعنى { لأخذنا منه باليمين }: لأخذنا بيمينه
